text: ‘Tomara amara kache lohara patasamuha niye asa, ‘abasese madhyabarti phamka sthana purna haye yakhana lauhastupa du'i parbatera samana hala takhana se balala, ‘tomara hampare dama dite thaka.’ Atahpara yakhana seta agune parinata hala, takhana se balala, ‘tomara amara kache galita tama niye asa, ami ta dhele de'i era upara
